overview: "Pantheon" is about the transition period of cinema from negative to digital, the film tries to deal with the emergence and change of different careers in cinema by linking different cinema jobs with ancient Greek myths. This film is a product of Iran's National Cinema School and was shown for the first time in 2018 in an international specialized seminar called "Cinema in the Digital Age". With a poetic and mythological expression, the film Pantheon tries to examine cinema as a dynamic art that never dies.
title: Pantheon
